update T_DATA_TYPE_CODE set code_name = ( select a.code_num || ':' || a.code_name from T_DATA_TYPE_CODE as a where a.koumoku_cd = T_DATA_TYPE_CODE.koumoku_cd and a.code_num = T_DATA_TYPE_CODE.code_num ) where code_name not like '%:%'
ALTER TABLE T_VERSION DROP MODULE_VERSION
INSERT INTO T_VERSION (ROW_ID,SCHEMA_VERSION,DB_VERSION,UPDATE_TIMESTAMP) VALUES ( 0 ,'1.0.0','1.0.0',CURRENT_TIME)
INSERT INTO T_VERSION (ROW_ID,SCHEMA_VERSION,DB_VERSION,UPDATE_TIMESTAMP) VALUES ( 0 ,'1.0.0','1.0.0',CURRENT_TIME)
UPDATE T_KENSHINMASTER SET MAX_BYTE_LENGTH = '##.00', XMLITEM_SEQNO = '510' WHERE KOUMOKU_CD = '3C015000002327101'
UPDATE T_KENSHINMASTER SET TANI = 'g/dL' ,XMLITEM_SEQNO = '560' WHERE KOUMOKU_CD = '3A010000002399901'

UPDATE T_KENSAKEKA_SONOTA SET JISI_KBN = ? WHERE JISI_KBN = ? AND (KEKA_TI != ? AND KEKA_TI is not null)
UPDATE T_KENSAKEKA_SONOTA SET HANTEI = ? WHERE (JISI_KBN = ? AND (KEKA_TI = ? OR KEKA_TI is null)) OR (JISI_KBN = ? AND (KEKA_TI = ? OR KEKA_TI is null))

task.query: ALTER TABLE T_KENSAKEKA_TOKUTEI ADD HENKAN_NITIJI Integer

UPDATE T_KENSAKEKA_TOKUTEI SET T_KENSAKEKA_TOKUTEI.HENKAN_NITIJI = (select TOKUTEI.HENKAN_NITIJI SUB_HENKAN FROM T_KESAI KESAI,T_KENSAKEKA_TOKUTEI TOKUTEI WHERE KESAI.UKETUKE_ID = TOKUTEI.UKETUKE_ID AND KESAI.KENSA_NENGAPI = TOKUTEI.KENSA_NENGAPI)
ALTER TABLE T_KESAI DROP HENKAN_NITIJI

task.query: CREATE TABLE T_KESAI_WK (TKIKAN_NO Char(10) NOT NULL, JISI_KBN Smallint NOT NULL, KENSA_NENGAPI Integer NOT NULL, SEIKYU_KBN Smallint NOT NULL, SYUBETU_CD Smallint NOT NULL, HKNJANUM Varchar(8) NOT NULL, HIHOKENJYASYO_KIGOU Varchar(40), HIHOKENJYASYO_NO Varchar(40), ITAKU_KBN Smallint, TANKA_KIHON Integer, HINKETU_CD Smallint, TANKA_HINKETU Integer, SINDENZU_CD Smallint, TANKA_SINDENZU Integer, GANTEI_CD Smallint, TANKA_GANTEI Integer, MADO_FUTAN_K_SYUBETU Smallint, MADO_FUTAN_KIHON Char(6), MADO_FUTAN_KIHON_OUT Char(6), MADO_FUTAN_S_SYUBETU Smallint, MADO_FUTAN_SYOUSAI Char(6), MADO_FUTAN_SYOUSAI_OUT Char(6), MADO_FUTAN_T_SYUBETU Smallint, MADO_FUTAN_TSUIKA Char(6), MADO_FUTAN_TSUIKA_OUT Char(6), TANKA_GOUKEI Integer NOT NULL, MADO_FUTAN_GOUKEI Integer, SEIKYU_KINGAKU Integer, SIHARAI_DAIKOU_BANGO Char(8), NENDO Smallint, UKETUKE_ID Numeric(12,0) NOT NULL, MADO_FUTAN_SONOTA Integer, HOKENJYA_FUTAN_KIHON Char(6), HOKENJYA_FUTAN_SYOUSAI Char(6), HOKENJYA_FUTAN_TSUIKA Char(6), HOKENJYA_FUTAN_DOC Char(6), TANKA_NINGENDOC Integer, MADO_FUTAN_D_SYUBETU Smallint, MADO_FUTAN_DOC Char(6), MADO_FUTAN_DOC_OUT Char(6), UPDATE_TIMESTAMP Timestamp, PRIMARY KEY (UKETUKE_ID,TKIKAN_NO,KENSA_NENGAPI,HKNJANUM))
CREATE INDEX IDX_T_KESAI ON T_KESAI (HIHOKENJYASYO_KIGOU,HIHOKENJYASYO_NO,TKIKAN_NO,KENSA_NENGAPI,HKNJANUM)

CREATE TABLE T_KESAI_SYOUSAI_WK (TKIKAN_NO Char(10) NOT NULL, KENSA_NENGAPI Integer NOT NULL, HKNJANUM Varchar(8) NOT NULL, HIHOKENJYASYO_KIGOU Varchar(40), HIHOKENJYASYO_NO Varchar(40), TUIKA_KENSIN_CD Varchar(17) NOT NULL, TANKA_TUIKA_KENSIN Integer, NENDO Smallint, UKETUKE_ID Numeric(12,0) NOT NULL, UPDATE_TIMESTAMP Timestamp, PRIMARY KEY (UKETUKE_ID,KENSA_NENGAPI,HKNJANUM,TUIKA_KENSIN_CD))
CREATE INDEX IDX_T_KESAI_SYOUSAI ON T_KESAI_SYOUSAI (HIHOKENJYASYO_KIGOU,HIHOKENJYASYO_NO,TKIKAN_NO,KENSA_NENGAPI,HKNJANUM)

CREATE TABLE T_SYUKEI_WK(ROW_ID Smallint NOT NULL, HKNJANUM Char(8) NOT NULL, KENSA_NENGAPI Integer NOT NULL, KENSA_JISI_KUBUN Smallint, KENSA_JISI_SOUSU Integer, KENSA_TANKA_SOUKEI Integer, KENSA_MADO_SOUKEI Integer, KENSA_SEIKYU_SOUKEI Integer, KENSA_SONOTA_SOUKEI Integer, UPDATE_TIMESTAMP Timestamp, PRIMARY KEY (HKNJANUM,KENSA_NENGAPI,ROW_ID))
drop table T_SYUKEI

CREATE TABLE T_SYUKEI(ROW_ID Smallint NOT NULL, HKNJANUM Char(8) NOT NULL, KENSA_NENGAPI Integer NOT NULL, KENSA_JISI_KUBUN Smallint, KENSA_JISI_SOUSU Integer, KENSA_TANKA_SOUKEI Integer, KENSA_MADO_SOUKEI Integer, KENSA_SEIKYU_SOUKEI Integer, KENSA_SONOTA_SOUKEI Integer, PRIMARY KEY (HKNJANUM,KENSA_NENGAPI,ROW_ID))

task.query: ALTER TABLE T_VERSION DROP MODULE_VERSION
CREATE TABLE T_POST(POST_CD Varchar(10) NOT NULL,ADDRESS Varchar(255),LAST_TIME Timestamp,PRIMARY KEY (POST_CD))

CREATE TABLE T_SYOKENMASTER(SYOKEN_TYPE Smallint NOT NULL, SYOKEN_TYPE_NAME Varchar(256), SYOKEN_NO Varchar(4) NOT NULL, SYOKEN_NAME Varchar(256), UPDATE_TIMESTAMP Timestamp NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (SYOKEN_TYPE,SYOKEN_NO))
CREATE TABLE T_SCREENMASTER(SCREEN_CD Varchar(3) NOT NULL,SCREEN_NAME Varchar(200),PRIMARY KEY (SCREEN_CD))
CREATE TABLE T_SCREENFUNCTION(SCREEN_CD Varchar(3) NOT NULL,FUNCTION_CD Varchar(3) NOT NULL,FUNCTION_FLG Char(1),PRIMARY KEY (SCREEN_CD,FUNCTION_CD))
CREATE TABLE T_HANTEIMASTER(HANTEI_TYPE Smallint NOT NULL,HANTEI_NO Smallint NOT NULL,HANTEI Varchar(256),UPDATE_TIMESTAMP Timestamp NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (HANTEI_TYPE,HANTEI_NO))
CREATE TABLE T_FUNCTIONMASTER(FUNCTION_CD Varchar(3) NOT NULL,FUNCTION_DETAIL Varchar(200),PRIMARY KEY (FUNCTION_CD))
